ComicInfo.Summary: The Peanuts gang is back! Featuring a cover drawn by Charles Schulz himself, this book brings you a mix of classic Peanuts Sundays and all-new strips seen here for the first time. From long-time fans to first-time young readers, everyone will find something to love about Snoopy, Woodstock, Linus, Lucy, Pigpen, Schroeder, and, of course, good ol' Charlie Brown!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 16:35:56. [CVDB315404]

ComicInfo.Inker: Bob Scott, Bob Scott, Charles M. Schulz, Matt Whitlock, Paige Braddock
ComicInfo.Colorist: Alexis E. Fajardo, Justin Thompson, Lisa Moore, Paige Braddock
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Charles M. Schulz, Nina Taylor Kester, Paige Braddock, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Editor: Adam Staffaroni, Alexis E. Fajardo, Matt Gagnon
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Frieda, Linus van Pelt, Lucy van Pelt, Marcie, Sally Brown, Snoopy, Violet Gray
